channel.title: Multimodal Learning on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Multimodal Learning on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Rethinking Token Reduction in MLLMs: Towards a Unified Paradigm for Training-Free Acceleration
item.description: FiCoCo: A unified paradigm accelerates Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM) inference by up to 82.4% with minimal performance loss, surpassing state-of-the-art training-free methods.

item.title: ShowUI: One Vision-Language-Action Model for GUI Visual Agent
item.description: ShowUI, a novel vision-language-action model, efficiently manages high-resolution GUI screenshots and diverse task needs via UI-guided token selection and interleaved streaming, achieving state-of-the…

item.title: SketchAgent: Language-Driven Sequential Sketch Generation
item.description: SketchAgent uses a multimodal LLM to generate dynamic, sequential sketches from textual prompts, enabling collaborative drawing and chat-based editing.

item.title: SALOVA: Segment-Augmented Long Video Assistant for Targeted Retrieval and Routing in Long-Form Video Analysis
item.description: SALOVA, a novel video-LLM framework, enhances long-form video comprehension through targeted retrieval. It introduces SceneWalk, a high-quality dataset of densely-captioned long videos, and integrates…

item.title: Knowledge Transfer Across Modalities with Natural Language Supervision
item.description: Teach AI new visual concepts using only their textual descriptions!

item.title: Large Multi-modal Models Can Interpret Features in Large Multi-modal Models
item.description: Large multimodal models’ inner workings are demystified using a novel framework that identifies, interprets, and even steers their internal features, opening the door to safer, more reliable AI.

item.title: MME-Survey: A Comprehensive Survey on Evaluation of Multimodal LLMs
item.description: This survey paper offers a comprehensive overview of Multimodal Large Language Model (MLLM) evaluation, systematically categorizing benchmarks and methods, and identifying gaps for future research, th…

item.title: VideoEspresso: A Large-Scale Chain-of-Thought Dataset for Fine-Grained Video Reasoning via Core Frame Selection
item.description: VideoEspresso: A new dataset and Hybrid LVLMs framework boost fine-grained video reasoning!

item.title: GMAI-VL & GMAI-VL-5.5M: A Large Vision-Language Model and A Comprehensive Multimodal Dataset Towards General Medical AI
item.description: GMAI-VL-5.5M & GMAI-VL: A new multimodal medical dataset and vision-language model achieve state-of-the-art results in various medical tasks.

item.title: Insight-V: Exploring Long-Chain Visual Reasoning with Multimodal Large Language Models
item.description: Insight-V: A multi-agent system enhances multi-modal LLMs’ visual reasoning by generating high-quality long-chain reasoning data and employing a two-stage training pipeline, achieving significant perf…

item.title: VideoAutoArena: An Automated Arena for Evaluating Large Multimodal Models in Video Analysis through User Simulation
item.description: VideoAutoArena automates large multimodal model (LMM) evaluation using simulated users, offering a cost-effective and scalable solution compared to traditional human annotation.

item.title: Awaker2.5-VL: Stably Scaling MLLMs with Parameter-Efficient Mixture of Experts
item.description: Awaker2.5-VL: A novel Mixture-of-Experts architecture stably scales MLLMs, solving multi-task conflict with parameter efficiency and achieving state-of-the-art performance.

item.title: BlueLM-V-3B: Algorithm and System Co-Design for Multimodal Large Language Models on Mobile Devices
item.description: BlueLM-V-3B: Algorithm and system co-design enables efficient, real-time multimodal language model deployment on mobile devices.

item.title: Enhancing the Reasoning Ability of Multimodal Large Language Models via Mixed Preference Optimization
item.description: Boosting multimodal reasoning in LLMs, researchers developed Mixed Preference Optimization (MPO) and a large-scale dataset (MMPR), significantly improving reasoning accuracy and achieving performance …

item.title: LLaVA-o1: Let Vision Language Models Reason Step-by-Step
item.description: LLaVA-01: A novel visual language model achieves superior reasoning performance through structured, multi-stage processing and efficient inference-time scaling, surpassing even larger, closed-source m…

item.title: SmoothCache: A Universal Inference Acceleration Technique for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: SmoothCache: A universal technique boosts Diffusion Transformer inference speed by 8-71% across modalities, without sacrificing quality!

item.title: JanusFlow: Harmonizing Autoregression and Rectified Flow for Unified Multimodal Understanding and Generation
item.description: JanusFlow harmonizes autoregression and rectified flow for unified multimodal understanding and generation, achieving state-of-the-art results on standard benchmarks.

item.title: LLM2CLIP: Powerful Language Model Unlock Richer Visual Representation
item.description: LLM2CLIP boosts CLIP’s performance by cleverly integrating LLMs, enabling it to understand longer, more complex image captions and achieving state-of-the-art results across various benchmarks.

item.title: VideoGLaMM: A Large Multimodal Model for Pixel-Level Visual Grounding in Videos
item.description: VideoGLaMM: a new large multimodal model achieves precise pixel-level visual grounding in videos by seamlessly integrating a dual vision encoder, a spatio-temporal decoder, and a large language model.

item.title: Both Text and Images Leaked! A Systematic Analysis of Multimodal LLM Data Contamination
item.description: MM-Detect: a novel framework detects contamination in multimodal LLMs, enhancing benchmark reliability by identifying training set leakage and improving performance evaluations.

item.title: Inference Optimal VLMs Need Only One Visual Token but Larger Models
item.description: Inference-optimal Vision Language Models (VLMs) need only one visual token but larger models!

item.title: TIP-I2V: A Million-Scale Real Text and Image Prompt Dataset for Image-to-Video Generation
item.description: TIP-I2V: A million-scale dataset provides 1.7 million real user text & image prompts for image-to-video generation, boosting model development and safety.

item.title: AndroidLab: Training and Systematic Benchmarking of Android Autonomous Agents
item.description: ANDROIDLAB, a novel framework, systematically benchmarks Android autonomous agents, improving LLM and LMM success rates on 138 tasks via a unified environment and open-source dataset.

item.title: OS-ATLAS: A Foundation Action Model for Generalist GUI Agents
item.description: OS-Atlas: A new open-source toolkit and model dramatically improves GUI agent performance by providing a massive dataset and innovative training methods, enabling superior generalization to unseen int…

item.title: BenchX: A Unified Benchmark Framework for Medical Vision-Language Pretraining on Chest X-Rays
item.description: BenchX: A unified benchmark framework reveals surprising MedVLP performance, challenging existing conclusions and advancing research.

item.title: Survey of User Interface Design and Interaction Techniques in Generative AI Applications
item.description: This study provides a comprehensive taxonomy of user interface design and interaction techniques in generative AI, offering valuable insights for developers and researchers aiming to enhance user expe…
